name: Dan in Dark 2: The Haunted Mansion
name_original: Dan in Dark 2: The Haunted Mansion
description:
Dan in Dark 2 : The Haunted Mansion is a 3D First Person Survival Horror game which is based on the story of ghost hunting enthusiast, Dan, who is a ghost investigator.  He got an invitation from an owner of an old mansion located in Canada to investigate the location. It was said that there was a ritual performed inside that mansion many many years ago. Since then, everything has changed. This old mansion is now haunted by evil spirits and is currently inhabitable.

The owner of the house wants to verify whether this mansion is really haunted. Dan might know the answer only after investigating different locations inside the mansion thoroughly.

This is the Halloween Special edition and a sequel of original Dan in Dark - The Dungeon indie game.

Can you escape the mansion alive?

KEY FEATURES
  • 3 Cases to solve!
  • Finding keys for locked doors!
  • Finding appropriate switches and make a way out!
  • Save and load the saved level from menu!
  • Watch the white and red sign boards. White sign board signifies
    correct way and Red sign board signifies incorrect way or the way full
    of danger.
  • Once you get caught by the entities, there might be less chance for you to survive.
  • Avoid getting caught by the evil entities.
SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1 and 10.[Both 32 and 64 bit]

Memory: 2 GB RAM(Recommended)

Processor: 1.2Ghz Core 2 Duo or Higher

Graphics: At least 512MB of video memory(AMD or NVIDIA Graphics card)

Compatible sound card.

DirectX 9.0c 

UPDATES

A few more updates might be available in future as the development continues. 

CONTACT ME

If you have any problem or face any issues during gameplay, please feel free to contact me. I hope you will enjoy the day! Happy Halloween!
